title: Anyone still hitting play again on Invasion? Lol
body: It's just that good of a game mode. Maybe people will keep it alive till patch inviting others to play till forcibly kicked.

replies.body: Invasion normal mode was fun enough. Onslaught was just lame. Maybe it wouldn't have felt so bad if they hadn't tied those quests to it.

Whaaat, you didn't feel any competitiveness to be able to beat such a rng toughish mode filled with 1 shotting death star tracking beams through the bullet hells as the kogs just kept firing with the bugs splatting you with isolation bonus alongside the  enemy spam of cc knockups as the reksais and chos c c c -ombo breaking while with the boss insta gibs your team with thousands of dodge ball while you keep standing on eachothers revives as it screams a pssh bring psshh brrring.  A starlight has fallen xd.
Nope. Just an RNG bullshit mode that requires more luck than skill. I'm OK with a little luck and a little skill, but it just usually felt like there was nothing to do to save yourself and your team.
